comment: Great app!

comment: Love the new profiles! Such a fun way to chat with my friends

comment: Bugs here and there but it seems to be getting better.

reply.content: I'm sorry to hear that Lucy - how strange! Can you get in touch with us via hello-at-kong-dot-wtf so we can investigate? Thanks!

title: It's Getting Better

author: Ian Follett
comment: Forget emoji, send your own personalized reaction GIFs. Slick, simple interface.

comment: #bigbro. #nicer #biggerme #iam #dmbw @DMBW_CA   Life, live, love
title: #KONG

author: Moshe de Freudiger
comment: Fun app

author: Roy Hembree
comment: I was unable to get the filter or font menus to appear. GIFs were low end with too few pixels and bad color palettes.

reply.author: Kong
reply.content: Sorry to hear filters/fonts weren't working for you - they should change when you swipe left-right on the screen. We keep the gifs low-res to ensure speed & limit how much data you're chewing through. :)

title: It didn't work as intended

author: Ahmed Sharba
comment: Fun concept but the filters doesn't work all the time and u should make an option on how to delete a post
title: It is good

author: Jeanne Sutton
comment: Fun app that feeds into the addictive nature. Looking forward to possibly be able to flip to the back camera for more fun.
title: Addictive

author: Tyler A
comment: So I downloaded the app and love the way it lets you make and share gifs to different channels. I have already run into a couple bugs in only a short time though. Hopefully it will be fixed soon!

reply.author: Kong
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback! We've got lots of updates and improvements in the works - we've only just begun. :)

title: good app, maybe not optimized yet

author: Shiraz Siddiqui
comment: I love gifs... but in the current form the app is pretty bland, maybe more useful if I could flip the camera around... or could find my friends on Twitter... but the upload contacts/address book doesn't work
title: Meh

author: Buck Cram
comment: Minor bugs, usability questions, and feature limitations, but cool idea and lots of fun. Look forward to seeing how Kong grows.

reply.author: Kong
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback Buck - we've only just begun!

author: ian mccarthy
comment: when my friend showed me Kong this morning it looked like a giftastic wall o' fun but I thought it'd get old fast. nope : it's so fun to PLAY WITH, from the way you follow people to piling into a channel immediately that it's frankly addictive so far.

reply.author: Kong
reply.content: Thanks for the awesome review - so glad to hear you're enjoying it!

title: it's like an always-on party

author: Lisa Neigut
comment: Took a while to find the filters and text options. Unlike Instagram or Snapchat, they get applied before you record. Be cool if there was post processing too!
